name: Chataroo.com
tag_list: live-chat, ticketing, visitor-tracking, ecommerce, marketing, sales
overview:
Manage customer support with one solution. Live chat, Ticketing Help Desk, and Visitor Tracking.

For customers who want immediate help, nothing satisfies and converts quite like a Live Chat Support. With one click on your website, customers begin a real-time exchange with an Operator. Reducing Call Volume and Increasing Customer Satisfaction!

Chataroo eTicketing allows you to manage your support services more efficiently, treating each and every incoming request as a unique, traceable ticket. Managing support requests sent in via email, through the web or over the phone in one EASY to use system empowers your support agents and reassures your end-users of quick, efficient and quality support!

Real-time visitor monitoring is a powerful and very useful part of the Chataroo system. Monitoring results will help you to gather details about your customers. Don’t miss a chance to improve your marketing strategy and increase your sales using the map and page view statistics!

Chataroo’s Incredibly Easy and Affordable! Both service teams and customers love to use Chataroo.

FEATURES:

  • Live Chat Support - Easy Integration, Incoming Notification, Operator Transfer, Custom Branding, Canned Responses, Multi-Language, Exit Survey, Social Media, Multi-Operator

  • Ticketing - Easy Integration, Unlimited Departments, Set Priority Levels, Unlimited Status, Respond by Email, Custom Branding, Assign to Operators

  • Visitor Tracking - Realtime, Map View, History, Visitor Data (IP,location,browser, and more)

milestones.description: It's Official we are Live Beta Launch!
milestones.source_description: Chararoo - Live Chat, Ticketing Help Desk, and Visitor Tracking
